title: User Registration
description: As a customer, I want to register for an account using multi-factor authentication, so that I can ensure my account is secure from its initiation.
attributes_and_rules: User must provide email, phone number for MFA, and create a password.
acceptance_criteria: 1. User can register with email and phone number. 2. User receives an MFA code for verification.
test_cases: Given a new user, when they provide email and phone number, then they should receive an MFA code for verification.

title: Login using Multi-Factor Authentication
description: As a customer, I want to log in using multi-factor authentication, so that I can securely access my account.
attributes_and_rules: User must enter username, password, and an MFA code sent to their device.
acceptance_criteria: 1. User can input username and password. 2. User receives an MFA code and verifies it to log in.
test_cases: Given an existing user, when they input their username, password, and MFA code, then they should be logged in securely.

title: Display Active Accounts
description: As a customer, I want to see my active accounts on my dashboard, so that I can quickly access my account details.
attributes_and_rules: Dashboard should show a summary of all active accounts with balance and recent activities.
acceptance_criteria: 1. Dashboard displays all active accounts with balances. 2. Recent activities for each account are shown.
test_cases: Given a logged-in user, when they view their dashboard, then they should see a list of active accounts with balances and recent transactions.

title: Show Personalized Offers
description: As a customer, I want to see personalized offers on my dashboard, so that I can take advantage of relevant banking products and services.
attributes_and_rules: Offers should be based on user profile and eligibility. Only relevant offers should be displayed.
acceptance_criteria: 1. Only eligible offers are displayed. 2. Offers are personalized based on user profile.
test_cases: Given a logged-in user, when they view their dashboard, then they should see personalized offers based on their profile and eligibility.

title: Responsive Web Design
description: As a customer, I want the portal to be responsive, so that I can have a consistent experience on any device.
attributes_and_rules: Design should use responsive design techniques to adapt to various screen sizes.
acceptance_criteria: 1. Portal layout adapts to desktop, tablet, and mobile devices. 2. User experience remains consistent across devices.
test_cases: Given a user accessing the portal, when they switch between devices, then they should experience a consistent and responsive layout.

title: Reusable UI Components
description: As a developer, I want reusable UI components, so that I can ensure consistency and reduce development time.
attributes_and_rules: Components should be modular, reusable, and follow design guidelines.
acceptance_criteria: 1. Reusable UI components are developed. 2. Components are consistent with the design guidelines.
test_cases: Given a developer using the design system, when they create UI elements, then they should use existing reusable components that align with the design guidelines.

epic_title: Account Opening and Service Modification Workflows
title: Account Opening Workflow
description: As a new customer, I want to initiate account opening, so that I can start using banking services.
attributes_and_rules: Workflow should be simple, require minimal inputs, and provide progress tracking.
acceptance_criteria: 1. User can initiate an account opening request. 2. User can save progress and resume later. 3. Confirmation is provided upon successful submission.
test_cases: Given a new user, when they initiate an account opening request, then they should be able to progress through the workflow, save and resume later, and receive confirmation upon successful submission.

epic_title: Account Opening and Service Modification Workflows
title: Service Modification Workflow
description: As an existing customer, I want to modify my account services, so that I can update my banking preferences.
attributes_and_rules: Workflow should be user-friendly, require minimal inputs, and integrate with backend systems.
acceptance_criteria: 1. User can modify existing services. 2. User can upload necessary documentation. 3. Confirmation is provided upon successful modification.
test_cases: Given an existing customer, when they modify their account services, then they should be able to complete the workflow, upload necessary documentation, and receive confirmation upon successful modification.

title: Real-Time Status Tracking
description: As a customer, I want to track the status of my requests in real-time, so that I can stay informed about their progress.
attributes_and_rules: The system should provide real-time updates on the status of requests visible in the dashboard.
acceptance_criteria: 1. User can view real-time status updates of their requests. 2. Status updates are accurate and timely.
test_cases: Given a user with ongoing requests, when they view their dashboard, then they should see real-time status updates of their requests.

title: Email Notifications
description: As a customer, I want to receive email notifications for status changes, so that I can take necessary actions promptly.
attributes_and_rules: Email notifications should be configurable and sent for significant status changes.
acceptance_criteria: 1. User receives email notifications for significant status changes. 2. Email content is clear and actionable.
test_cases: Given a user with requests in progress or completed, when there is a significant status change, then they should receive a clear and actionable email notification.

title: Comprehensive Interaction History
description: As a customer, I want to view my interaction history, so that I can keep track of completed transactions and requests.
attributes_and_rules: Interaction history should be comprehensive and easily accessible through the portal.
acceptance_criteria: 1. User can view a complete log of their interactions and transactions. 2. History is easily accessible and secure.
test_cases: Given a logged-in user, when they access their interaction history, then they should see a complete and secure log of their completed transactions and requests.

epic_title: Core Banking Integration and Data Synchronization
title: Core Banking Integration
description: As a systems integrator, I want to integrate the portal with core banking systems, so that data synchronization is seamless and secure.
attributes_and_rules: Integration should use secure APIs and middleware to ensure data synchronization integrity.
acceptance_criteria: 1. Core banking systems are integrated with the portal. 2. Data synchronization is seamless and secure.
test_cases: Given the portal with core banking integration, when data is synchronized, then it should seamlessly and securely update from the core systems.

epic_title: Core Banking Integration and Data Synchronization
title: Data Synchronization
description: As a systems integrator, I want customer account and transaction data synchronized accurately, so that the portal reflects real-time information.
attributes_and_rules: Data synchronization must be accurate, maintain high performance, and be secure.
acceptance_criteria: 1. Customer account and transaction data are synchronized accurately. 2. Data updates are handled in real-time.
test_cases: Given synchronized data, when account or transaction data changes, then the portal should update to reflect real-time information accurately.

title: Role-Based Access Control
description: As a security administrator, I want to implement role-based access controls, so that users can only access appropriate content and services.
attributes_and_rules: Access controls should be granular and enforce backend policies and audit mechanisms.
acceptance_criteria: 1. Role-based access controls are implemented. 2. Users can only access content and services according to their roles.
test_cases: Given implemented role-based access controls, when users access the portal, then they should only be able to view and interact with content and services relevant to their roles.
